review.title: “Boutique energy consulting rirm that needs to decide what it takes to be sucessful.”
review.pros: Pros – Flat organization structure with lots of opportunity to get involved. If you are on a project, stay billable and you will be left alone to add value to the client.
review.cons: Cons – Flat organizational structure where every function gets involved with mose things. If you are not billable, you may want to find a way to get billable FAST!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Trust your people to do the right thing. Understand that HR need to stick to HR.
